title: How to fast index a website - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah many don’t know, I will give you 2 fast ways to get your website indexed. (Point No. 1) First one is using Google Console or you can also go to the Search Console - Crawl URL option directly and submit your website link, but you should be logged on to your gmail account. The second way is to create a blog in any Web 2.0 like Blogger, WordPress, Wix, Weebly. Here you create the website like a blog. To start with initially post 3–5 blog posts. After that you can start inserting your backlinks in the posts as anchor text links. You can place around 10–15 links and get the post published. Since these are Web 2.0, the search engine bots crawl them regularly and keep updating its database or index. Wait for a week and remove all links as it would have got crawled. If it hasn’t then you can manually submit the Post URL to Google as mentioned in Point No. 1 above. There are also paid options available, but they too have a limit of 15–50 URLs per day. Why? Remember, the backlinks have to look natural. For more on SEO, please do visit my website - SKARTEC Digital Marketing Academy

Indexing in SEO simply refers to search engines keeping a record of the web pages. When worked upon, websites should aim for effective indexing across all the search engines like Google, Yahoo, Bing etc. Using external sites to send crawlers to your own website is one of the most efficient strategies for fast indexing. Following are the other effective strategies that you need to research upon and implement : Sitemap Submission Blog Commenting and Sharing Do-follow Links Popular website stats programming Social bookmarking submission Guest posting Ping Services Lastly, you can use WordPress as a content writing platform for optimum indexing experience for your website.

Simple Steps to Index Your Website fast on Google: Create a SitemapSubmit Sitemap to Google Webmaster ToolsSubmit Website URL to Search EnginesCreate A Robots.txt FileCreate or Update Social ProfilesShare Your New Website LinkBookmarkingCreate Offsite ContentCheck for Google crawl errors frequently

If you wanna fast indexing a website than you have to submit URL manually to Google and other search engines. Else search engines generally have their own schedule to visit all sites and indexing. Generally it would take 24 to 72 hrs. for indexing.

Hi Anand, thanks for requesting me, Create a sitemap, we want to index our website​ simply define the site property,2. Than click on to the crawl 3. Click on fetch as google 4. Put the url and click on fetch and render. You will get indexed soon.
Submit your website manually on search console

Submit blog ( 400 characters) Sitemap submission Social bookmarking submission Guest posting Ping services Submit Website URL to Search Engines sites Create or Update Social Profiles Submit to Blog Directories
